companyInfo.sloganEn: AI Digital Employees for Every Factory
companyInfo.focus: Smart Production · AI Quality Control · Equipment O&M · Data Analysis
companyInfo.address: Electronic Information Industry Building, 1st Ring Road, Chenghua District, Chengdu, China
companyInfo.subtitle: 24/7 intelligent assistant providing comprehensive AI services for your factory including production management, quality inspection, equipment maintenance, and more.

intro: Industrial Engineering AI Expert is an intelligent analysis assistant tailored for manufacturing engineers. With years of deep focus on industrial engineering, we deeply understand engineers' needs and challenges in time study, motion analysis, human-machine collaboration, OEE calculation, and line balancing.

Through multi-round interactive dialogue, we guide you to provide necessary information and apply professional industrial engineering methodologies to provide precise calculation results and in-depth analysis, helping you make scientific decisions.

Our AI expert system is based on standard industrial engineering methods such as MOST, MTM, and MODAPTS, combined with machine learning technology, to provide professional, efficient, and reliable industrial engineering analysis services.
aboutUs.mission: Empower industrial engineers through AI technology, providing professional analysis services such as time study, motion analysis, and OEE calculation. The platform adopts an interactive dialogue approach to guide users to provide key information and generate professional industrial engineering analysis reports.
aboutUs.vision: To become the most professional AI intelligent assistant in the field of industrial engineering, driving lean production with data and empowering engineering decisions with AI.
values: Equal emphasis on professionalism and ease of use
Equal emphasis on precise calculation and in-depth analysis
Equal emphasis on theoretical methods and practical experience
Equal emphasis on continuous learning and effect guarantee

coreAdvantages.title: Multi-round Interactive Dialogue
coreAdvantages.description: Through structured dialogue process, gradually guide engineers to provide necessary information. The system intelligently adjusts questions based on your answers to ensure complete and accurate data acquisition and improve analysis efficiency.

coreAdvantages.title: Professional Methodology Support
coreAdvantages.description: Based on international standard industrial engineering methods such as MOST, MTM, and MODAPTS, combined with Six Sigma and Lean Production theories, to provide scientifically rigorous analysis results.

coreAdvantages.title: Precise Calculation and Analysis
coreAdvantages.description: Adopt advanced algorithm models to accurately calculate key indicators such as time, OEE, and line balance rate. Automatically identify bottleneck processes and provide optimization suggestions to help improve production efficiency.

coreAdvantages.title: Professional Report Generation
coreAdvantages.description: Automatically generate structured professional reports, including detailed calculation processes, data analysis, visualization charts, and improvement suggestions. Support export to PDF, Excel, and other formats.

focusAreas.name: Time Study
focusAreas.description: Standard time, actual time, predetermined time calculation

caseStudies.title: Automotive Assembly Line Time Study
caseStudies.subtitle: Accurate standard time measurement and line optimization
caseStudies.painPoint: Unbalanced workstation times causing frequent production bottlenecks and low overall efficiency.

features.name: Precise Time Study
features.description: Detailed measurement of 42 assembly processes using MOST method, establishing standard time database

features.name: Bottleneck Analysis
features.description: Automatically identify bottleneck processes, analyze line balance rate, provide optimization plans

features.name: Workstation Optimization
features.description: Redistribute work content based on time data, improve line balance rate to 95%

caseStudies.outcome: Line balance rate improved from 68% to 95%, production efficiency increased by 40%, eliminated major bottlenecks, annual output value increased by 20 million yuan.

caseStudies.title: Electronics Factory OEE Comprehensive Analysis
caseStudies.subtitle: Comprehensive improvement of Overall Equipment Effectiveness
caseStudies.painPoint: Low equipment utilization, frequent failures, OEE hovering around 60%.

features.name: Real-time OEE Monitoring
features.description: Establish OEE calculation model, real-time monitoring of availability, performance, and quality rates

features.name: Six Big Losses Analysis
features.description: Automatically analyze six big losses: breakdowns, setup/adjustment, idling/minor stops, reduced speed, startup losses, defects/rework

features.name: Improvement Plans
features.description: Provide targeted improvement suggestions and action plans for major loss sources

caseStudies.outcome: OEE improved from 60% to 85%, equipment failure rate reduced by 70%, capacity increased by 42%, annual cost savings of 5 million yuan.

caseStudies.title: Machining Motion Analysis Optimization
caseStudies.subtitle: Motion improvement based on MTM method

features.name: MTM Motion Decomposition
features.description: Detailed MTM motion decomposition of key processes, identifying ineffective motions

features.name: Motion Economy Principles
features.description: Apply 22 motion economy principles to optimize work motions and workstation layout

features.name: Improvement Implementation
features.description: Develop detailed improvement plans, train operators, standardize work operations

caseStudies.outcome: Single-piece processing time reduced from 185 seconds to 128 seconds, 44% efficiency improvement, 30% reduction in operator fatigue, quality pass rate increased to 99.5%.

caseStudies.title: Human-Machine Collaboration Efficiency Analysis
caseStudies.subtitle: Optimize human-machine ratio, improve collaboration efficiency

features.name: Human-Machine Chart Analysis
features.description: Draw human-machine operation charts, analyze idle time of personnel and equipment

features.name: Load Rate Calculation
features.description: Accurately calculate personnel and equipment load rates, find optimization opportunities

features.name: Ratio Optimization
features.description: Optimize human-machine ratio, achieve efficient modes of one person operating multiple machines or multiple people operating one machine

caseStudies.outcome: Achieved 1 person operating 3 machines, 200% personnel efficiency improvement, equipment utilization increased from 65% to 90%, per capita output doubled.
